title: (Fri Early Bird)  Brand New Easy Trivia! + Fun Fact Friday + Mailbag: Road Rage Incident With Boss
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird)  Brand New Easy Trivia! + Fun Fact Friday + Mailbag: Road Rage Incident With Boss
description:
We kick off the weekend by starting a brand-new season of Easy Trivia! We go around the room and see if everyone can answer these easy questions. And learn something new today with Fun Fact Friday!  Bobby opens the mailbag and helps a listener whose fiancé got into a road rage incident with her boss and now he wants her to leave her job. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
